messages.subject: Need some good  fresh ideas
messages.msgSnippet: Ok I need some new ideas. In a couple months Justin my 6 year old will be having surgery. This is a BIG surgery he will be in the hospital for about 2 weeks.
messages.messageBody:
Ok I need some new ideas. In a couple months Justin my 6 year old
will be having surgery. This is a BIG surgery he will be in the
hospital for about 2 weeks. The last week will not be a big deal
because he will be able to go to the art room BUT the first week he
will be IN bed. Cheyenne at 4 yo had the same surgery it is awful.
They can not eat for at LEAST 7-10 days.
I REALLY REALLY, for my own sanity, need some fresh ideas to keep him
occupied. This is a child that snacks ALL day. HE is ALWAYS hungry
and he is going to get bored watching movies.

Please keep in mind he may not be able to sit up or even hold a
pen/crayon. Cheyenne has had several surgeries but at 2-3 years old
she was content with movies.
We also must travel to Michigan and we are in St. louis. I LOVE LOVE
LOVE traveling with my kids it is SO much fun, but when it is for
surgery it is a little more stressfull for all.

Thanks in advance

Michelle
